d: A FreeSewing pattern that needs a description

s.cutWaistband.d: The **waistband** is a rectangular piece of main fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long.

neckHeightFront.d: The depth of the neck hole at the front

neckHeightBack.d: The depth of the neck hole at the back

armpitAdjustment.d: Move the armpit up or down

strapPosition.d: Move the straps towards your shoulders or neck

strapAngle.d: The angle of the straps on your shoulder line

strapWidth.d: The width of the shoulder straps

backWidth.d: The width of narrow part on the back

bustPointFocus.d: How much the virtual bust darts aim at the bust point

backDartAngle.d: The angle of the virtual back dart

upperBackShape.d: The upper curve of the C shape on the back

lowerBackShape.d: The lower curve of the C shape on the back

strapCurveFront.d: How straight the shoulder straps are on the front

strapCurveBack.d: How straight the shoulder straps are on the back

elasticWidth.d: The width of the elastic band you use for the underbust band

verticalStretch.d: How much the fabric will stretch vertically, when worn

strapStretch.d: How much the fabric will stretch along the straps, when worn

horizontalBustStretch.d: How much the fabric will stretch along the bust line, when worn

horizontalBandStretch.d: How much the fabric will stretch along the elastic band, when worn

splitOffsetFront.d: Shifts the front seam towards the side or the bust

splitOffsetBack.d: Shifts the back seam towards the side or the back
